tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
quoteText:
The visitor statistics include information about the visitorâ€™s truncated IP-address, usage patterns, the point in time the visitor visits our websites on Vivaldi.net and Vivaldi.com and information about the browser and operating system the visitor uses.

This information is collected solely for statistical purpose and is not used to identify individuals.
